pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 18, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, January 18, 2018:

Québec, Quebec

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Québec, Régis Labeaume.

Salon de la mairie
Hôtel de ville de Québec
2 rue des Jardins

Notes for media:

  • Media are asked to be at the City Hall “Salle de réception” no later than 10:45 a.m.
  • Photo opportunity upon arrival at the front of City Hall
  • Photo opportunity of the signing of the Guestbook and at the beginning of the meeting

6 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

École secondaire De Rochebelle
1095 avenue de Rochebelle

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive via door 5 no later than 5 p.m.

Media appearances

  • 8:10 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on CIHO-FM Charlevoix.
  • 8:10 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Bouchard en parle, FM93.
  • 8:35 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Première heure, Radio-Canada Québec.
  • 10 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on 98.9 ÉNERGIE Québec.
